name: Dawn Of White
description:
Dawn Of White is a card-based strategy game. Hordes of wild creatures have rose from oblivion and now are threatening the kingdom with extinction. These disgusting creatures absorbing light - main matter of the world, so you goal is to collect fragments of light and push back the enemy!

Crystals of light is the only way to stop coming of the darkness, but only if you keep it far from those monsters. They can help you to make defence, improve the army and finally push back the enemy.

Сollect your deck!

Use your cards desk to change your base look, add more solders or to blow up heads of monsters.

Gather Resources

Building base is great, but it takes resources, so don't forget to order workers to get some materials.

Campaign map

The whole kingdom was occupied that means our path will be long, but with each liberated region a new card will be available! We still have hope and people need you.

Features:
  • Make an impregnable base
  • Unlock new units
  • Upgrade cards [in development]
  • Each wave - random card
    • 15 cards - units, buildings, spells
  • Hand out tasks to stand the siege
  • Original gameplay
  • Different enemies [in development]
  • Storyline [in development]
